EmailTemplate.description: Notify Reseller that Unreal Subscription setup is complete
EmailTemplate.name: [ENG] Reseller Order Complete - Unreal Subscription
EmailTemplate.subject: Unreal Subscription order for {{{Opportunity.Account_Name_Puller__c}}}​
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for submitting your annual Unreal Subscription order.
We have prepared or updated an organization record for the customer and applied the specified quantity of annual Unreal Subscription licenses. - Organization ID: {{{Partner_Request__c.Org_Id__c}}} - for Epic/Partner internal purposes only - no need to share with customer
You are welcome to share the below information with the customer's license administrator.
Thanks
- The Epic Games Developer-Access Team
Unreal Subscription License ManagementAs the license administrator for your company, you have been granted administrative privileges and are responsible for the management of your team's accounts and licenses for: - Annual License to Unreal Subscription - Including Unreal Engine < https://www.unrealengine.com/ > , Twinmotion < https://www.twinmotion.com/ > and RealityCapture < https://www.capturingreality.com/realitycapture >
- Offline Installer access
Please follow the link and log into the Epic Games account associated with your email address used here to access the Developer Portal < https://dev.epicgames.com/portal > . From here you may:
- Review the license seat quantity and expiration date - Invite colleagues to join your company’s organization - Assign and remove license seats from members of your organization - Download Offline Installers (available only to administrators) - Review product resources and support options
Additional Information
You may optionally install the licensed software from the Epic Games launcher < https://www.unrealengine.com/download > , or by using the provided Offline Installer.
To access learning materials and discussion forums, visit the Epic Developer Community < https://dev.epicgames.com/community/ > .
Thank you!
© 2024, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved. Epic, Epic Games, the Epic Games logo, Unreal, Unreal Engine, the Unreal Engine logo, Twinmotion, the Twinmotion logo, RealityCapture, and the RealityCapture logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of Epic Games, Inc. in the USA and elsewhere. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
Terms of Service < https://www.epicgames.com/site/en-US/tos > | Privacy Policy < https://www.epicgames.com/site/en-US/privacypolicy > Box 254, 2474 Walnut Street, Cary, North Carolina, 27518
